metadata.title: CVE-2023-29546 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: When recording the screen while in Private Browsing on Firefox for Android the address bar and keyboard were not hidden, potentially leaking sensitive information. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112 and Focus for Android < 112.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap rodrigo-zaiden> Android issue only

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
